message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I'm asking for $18,000. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more than that to me. How about we meet in the middle at $16,000?

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $16,000. How about we meet in the middle from there, at $14,500? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  Let's make this final offer - $15,000. It's a really good deal for a product of this quality.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not sure I can go up to $15,000. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500? I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I really need to stay within my budget.
